ygData.subject: Re: Hunting wisps
ygData.msgSnippet: That s not the real Kerra Isle.  Kerra Isle can be found by going through the Toxx Forest outside Erudin.  You have to swim due west from the dock with the
ygData.messageBody:
That's not the real Kerra Isle. Kerra Isle can be found by going
through the Toxx Forest outside Erudin. You have to swim due west
from the dock with the Necromancer by it. I use to believe that the
island between Qeynos and Erudin was Kerra Isle, till I was corrected
by someone else.

On Wed, 28 Apr 1999 08:37:04 -0400, you wrote:

>If you can make it... Visit Kerra Isle, you can find by taking the boat
>between Qeynos and Eurdin. Its loaded with wisp and its just a small
>island. You can get stones through-out the day. But they are easier to see
>at night because the ones that carry stones light up the ground around them.
>
>Lance
>
